CREATE TABLE "Hospede" (
  "id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "nome" varchar NOT NULL,
  "cpf" varchar UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  "email" varchar UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  "telefone" varchar NOT NULL,
  "endereco" varchar NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Endereco" (
  "id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  "rua" varchar NOT NULL,
  "numero" int NOT NULL,
  "cep" varchar NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "EnderecoHospede" (
  "id" int PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  "id_hospede" int NOT NULL,
  "id_endereco" int NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "EnderecoFuncionario" (
  "id" int PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  "id_funcionario" int NOT NULL,
  "id_endereco" int NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Tipo_quarto" (
  "id_tipo_quarto" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "nome" varchar NOT NULL,
  "capacidade_max" int NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Quarto" (
  "id_quarto" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "numero" varchar UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  "id_tipo_quarto" int NOT NULL,
  "status" bool NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Historico_preco" (
  "id_historico_preco" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "id_tipo_quarto" int NOT NULL,
  "preco" decimal NOT NULL,
  "data_inicio" date NOT NULL,
  "data_fim" date NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Reserva" (
  "id_reserva" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "id_hospede" int NOT NULL,
  "id_quarto" int NOT NULL,
  "id_cancelamento" int NOT NULL,
  "data_checkin" date NOT NULL,
  "data_checkout" date NOT NULL,
  "valor_total" decimal NOT NULL,
  "status" varchar NOT NULL,
  "motivo_cancelamento" varchar NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Servico_adicional" (
  "id_servico" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "nome" varchar NOT NULL,
  "descricao" varchar NOT NULL,
  "preco" decimal NOT NULL,
  "estoque" int NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Reserva_servico" (
  "id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "id_reserva" int NOT NULL,
  "id_servico" int NOT NULL,
  "quantidade" int NOT NULL,
  "data_solicitacao" date NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Pagamento" (
  "id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "id_reserva" int NOT NULL,
  "metodo" varchar NOT NULL,
  "valor" decimal NOT NULL,
  "data_pagamento" date NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Funcionario" (
  "id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "nome" varchar NOT NULL,
  "cpf" varchar UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  "cargo" varchar NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Limpeza_quarto" (
  "id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "id_quarto" int NOT NULL,
  "id_funcionario" int NOT NULL,
  "data_da_limpeza" date NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Avaliacao" (
  "id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "nota" int NOT NULL,
  "comentario" varchar NOT NULL,
  "data" date NOT NULL,
  "id_hospede" int NOT NULL,
  "id_reserva" int NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Cancelamento" (
  "id_cancelamento" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "data_reserva" date NOT NULL,
  "data_cancelamento" date NOT NULL,
  "estorno" bool NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Motivo_cancelamento" (
  "id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "descricao_cancelamento" varchar NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE "EnderecoHospede" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_hospede") REFERENCES "Hospede" ("id");

ALTER TABLE "EnderecoHospede" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_endereco") REFERENCES "Endereco" ("id");

ALTER TABLE "EnderecoFuncionario" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_funcionario") REFERENCES "Funcionario" ("id");

ALTER TABLE "EnderecoFuncionario" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_endereco") REFERENCES "Endereco" ("id");

ALTER TABLE "Quarto" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_tipo_quarto") REFERENCES "Tipo_quarto" ("id_tipo_quarto");

ALTER TABLE "Historico_preco" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_tipo_quarto") REFERENCES "Tipo_quarto" ("id_tipo_quarto");

ALTER TABLE "Reserva" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_hospede") REFERENCES "Hospede" ("id");

ALTER TABLE "Reserva" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_quarto") REFERENCES "Quarto" ("id_quarto");

ALTER TABLE "Reserva" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_cancelamento") REFERENCES "Cancelamento" ("id_cancelamento");

ALTER TABLE "Reserva_servico" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_reserva") REFERENCES "Reserva" ("id_reserva");

ALTER TABLE "Reserva_servico" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_servico") REFERENCES "Servico_adicional" ("id_servico");

ALTER TABLE "Pagamento" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_reserva") REFERENCES "Reserva" ("id_reserva");

ALTER TABLE "Limpeza_quarto" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_quarto") REFERENCES "Quarto" ("id_quarto");

ALTER TABLE "Limpeza_quarto" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_funcionario") REFERENCES "Funcionario" ("id");

ALTER TABLE "Avaliacao" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_hospede") REFERENCES "Hospede" ("id");

ALTER TABLE "Avaliacao" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id_reserva") REFERENCES "Reserva" ("id_reserva");

ALTER TABLE "Motivo_cancelamento" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("id") REFERENCES "Cancelamento" ("id_cancelamento");


INSERT INTO "Tipo_quarto" ("id_tipo_quarto", "nome", "capacidade_max") VALUES
(1, 'Standard', 2),
(2, 'Deluxe', 2),
(3, 'Suite', 4),
(4, 'Family', 5),
(5, 'Presidential', 6);
